enchantment.minecraft.mending.desc: A single-use enchantment. Fully repairs any item and resets its anvil cost.
enchantment.darkerdepths.quick_dash.desc: Reduces the dash cooldown of the Stiletto by 25% per level multiplicative.
enchantment.darkerdepths.swift_strike.de: When dashing with the Stiletto, dealing damage while in the dash will recharge the dash cooldown instantly.
enchantment.deep_aether.gloves_reach.des: Increases the range at which the player can interact with blocks.
enchantment.ntrails.breach.desc: Increases the effectiveness of attacks against armored targets.
enchantment.ntrails.density.desc: Increases attack damage based on your fall distance.
enchantment.ntrails.wind_burst.desc: Smash attacks will launch the user back into the air.
